desc.cn: Carapace-bin 是一个命令行补全工具，能为多个 CLI 命令提供参数补全，并可跨多个 POSIX 和非 POSIX shell 工作。
desc.en: Carapace-bin provides argument completion for multiple CLI commands (full list), and works across multiple POSIX and non-POSIX shells.

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew tap rsteube/homebrew-tap
brew install rsteube/tap/carapace

/zypper.cmd:
zypper ar --gpgcheck-allow-unsigned -f https://yum.fury.io/rsteube/ carapace
zypper install carapace-bin

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
scoop bucket add extras
scoop install extras/carapace-bin
